title: Sum of Array Elements
description: Given an integer array nums, return the sum of its values. Use loops or LINQ.

title: Find Maximum Value in Array
description: Return the maximum value inside an array.

title: Count Vowels in String
description: Count how many vowels appear in a given string.

title: Remove Duplicate Elements
description: Remove duplicate integers while keeping original order.
hints: Use HashSet to track seen items.

title: Check Palindrome String
description: Check if string s is a palindrome ignoring case.

title: Word Frequency Counter
description: Given a sentence, return a dictionary of word frequencies.

title: Sort Strings Alphabetically
description: Sort a list of strings in alphabetical order.

title: Filter Even Numbers
description: Print only even numbers from an array.

title: Square Each Number
description: Square each number in an array using LINQ map (Select).

title: Check If Key Exists in Dictionary
description: Check whether a dictionary contains a given key.
